tuv.seg: Glossary of immigration terms
Gluais de Théarmaí Inimirce
Glossary of Immigration Terms
Gluais de Théarmaí Inimirce
│Asylum seeker│A person who is seeking to be recognised as a Convention refugee under the Geneva │
│Iarrthóir │Duine atá ag iarraidh go n-aithneofaí é mar Dhídeanaí Coinbhinsiúin faoi │
│ │Written permission from the Minister for Justice and Equality to a non-EEA │
│ │Seo cead scríofa ón Aire Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais do náisiúnach │
│ │national to allow you to become established and engage in business in Ireland
│ │neamh-LEE le ligeann duit tú féin a lonnú agus dul i mbun gnó in Éirinn
│Business │Business permission usually lasts for 1 year initially
│ │gnách go dtugtar cead gnó ar feadh bliain amháin ar dtús
│permission │A visa-required national will still need a visa as well as the business │
│Cead gnó │Náisiúnach nach mór víosa a bheith aige/aici, beidh víosa ag teastáil uaidh nó │
│ │If you hold a business permission, you will have residence stamp number 1 endorsed│
│ │Má tá cead gnó agat déanfar an stampa cónaithe uimhir 1 ar do phas a │
│ │The type of visa that allows a visa-required national to come to Ireland with a │
│ │An chineál víosa a ligeann do náisiúnach nach mór víosa a bheith aige/aici │
│C Visa │view to staying a maximum of 90 days (3 months)
│Víosa C │teacht go hÉirinn agus é ar intinn aige nó aici fanacht ar feadh 90 lá (3 mhí) │
│ │holder must leave the State on or before expiry of the visa
│ │nuair a éagann an víosa nó roimhe sin
│ │A card issued to all legally resident non-EEA nationals who stay in Ireland for │
│ │Cárta a eisítear do gach náisiúnach neamh-LEE a bhfuil cónaí dlíthiúil orthu in│
│ │more than 3 months
│ │Éirinn agus a fhanann in Éirinn ar feadh níos faide ná 3 mhí
Possession of this Certificate of Registration verifies that │
│ │Clárúcháin seo ag duine dearbhaíonn sé gur chláraigh siad lena n-oifigeach │
│of │The card is a credit-card sized document
│ │ │ │Deimhniú │Doiciméad ar an méid céanna le cárta creidmheasa atá sa chárta
│Registration │number of the relevant residence stamp (see below), date of expiry and the GNIB │
│clárúcháin │grianghraf den duine, uimhir an stampa chónaithe ábhartha (féach thíos) dáta │
Sometimes called a GNIB card or a residence permit
Uaireanta tugtar cárta BNGSI nó cead │
│ │several different versions of the card, depending on the person’s status, which │
│ │ │ │ │Tá go leor leaganacha éagsúla den chárta ann, ag brath ar stádas an duine. Tá │
There is a fee for the card of €300 (with exceptions)
Gearrtar táille €300 ar an │ │ │gcárta (le heisceachtaí)
│ │A person who is recognised as being a refugee under the criteria set down in the │
│ │Duine atá aitheanta mar dhídeanaí faoi na critéir atá leagtha amach i │
│Convention │1951 Geneva Convention relating to the Status of Refugees, as implemented by │
│Dídeanaí │gCoinbhinsiúin na Ginéive 1951 i dtaobh Stádas Dídeanaithe, mar atá curtha i │
│refugee │legislation in Ireland
│Coinbhinsiúin │bhfeidhm ag an reachtaíocht in Éirinn
│ │A Convention refugee will receive residence stamp no. 4 and will not need an │
│ │Gheobhaidh dídeanaí Coinbhinsiúin stampa cónaithe uimhir 4 agus ní gá dó/dí le │
│ │employment permit or business permission to work in Ireland
│ │cead fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in Éirinn
│Critical │The Critical Skills Employment Permit is for a restricted list of occupations in │
│Cead │Baineann Cead Fostaíochta Scileanna Ríthábhachtacha le liosta srianta gairme sa│
│Skills │the annual salary range from €30,000 to €60,000 and for occupations in the annual │
│Fostaíochta │raon tuarastail bliantúil idir €30,000 agus €60,000 agus do ghairmeacha sa raon│
│Employment │salary range above €60,000
│Scileanna │tuarastail bliantúil thar €60,000
If you hold a Critical Skills Employment Permit you │
Má tá Cead Fostaíochta Scileanna │
│Permit │will have residence stamp number 1 endorsed on your passport. │
│Ríthábhachtacha│Ríthábhachtacha agat déanfar stampa cónaithe uimhir 1 a fhormhuiniú ar do phas.│
│ │A visa that allows a visa-required national to come to Ireland with a view to │
│ │Víosa a ligeann do náisiúnach nach mór víosa a bheith aige/aici teacht go │
│D Visa │staying more than 90 days (3 months)
│Víosa D │hÉirinn agus é ar intinn aige/aici fanacht níos faide ná 90 lá (3 mhí)
│ │A citizen of one of the member states of the European Economic Area (EEA)
│ │Saoránach as ceann de na ballstáit sa Limistéar Eorpach Eacnamaíoch (LEE)
│ │is made up of the EU member states (see EU national below) together with Iceland, │
│ │an LEE comhdhéanta de Bhallstáit an AE (féach náisiúnach AE thíos) i dteannta │
There are similar arrangements for Swiss nationals so │
Baineann socruithe cosúlacha do │
│EEA national │the term EEA national is often used to cover EEA and Swiss nationals
│ │náisiúnaigh na hEilvéise agus mar sin is minic go n-úsáidtear an téarma │
│ │No residence stamp is placed on the passport of an EEA national on arrival in │
│ │ │ │ │Ní chuirtear aon stampa cónaithe ar phas náisiúnach LEE nuair a thagann sé/sí │
│ │In general an EEA national does not need an employment permit or business │
│ │De ghnáth ní gá do náisiúnach LEE le cead fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in│
│ │A document which non-EEA nationals must have in order to be allowed to work in │
│ │Doiciméad nach mór bheith ag náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE le cead a fháil oibriú in │
│permit │There are 9 types of employment permit including General Employment Permit and │
│Cead │ │ │fostaíochta │Tá 9 saghas de cheadanna fostaíochta lena n-áirítear á Cead Fostaíochta │
│ │Critical Skills Employment Permit
│ │Ginearálta agus Cead Fostaíochta Scileanna Ríthábhachtacha
If you hold an employment permit, you will have│
Má tá cead │
│ │residence stamp number 1 endorsed on your passport
│ │fostaíochta agat, déanfar stampa cónaithe uimhir 1 ar do phas a fhormhuiniú
│ │A citizen of the European Union
│ │Saoránach den Aontas Eorpach
The members of the EU are: Austria, Belgium, │
Is iad baill an AE ná: An Ostair, an Bheilg, an │
│ │Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, │
│ │Chróit, an Chipir, Poblacht na Seice, an Danmhairg, an Eastóin, an Fhionlainn, │
│ │Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, │
│ │an Fhrainc, an Ghearmáin, an Ghréig, an Ungáir, Éire, an Iodáil, an Laitvia, │
│EU national │the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and │
│Náisiúnach AE │Lucsamburg, Málta, an Íoslainn, an Pholainn, an Phortaingéil, an Rómáin, an │
│or EU citizen│the United Kingdom
│nó saoránach AE│tSlóvaic, an tSlóivéin, an tSualainn agus an Ríocht Aontaithe
│ │No residence stamp is placed on the passport of an EU national on arrival in │
│ │Ní chuirtearstampa cónaithe ar phas náisiúnach AE nuair a thagann sé/sí go │
An EU national does not need an employment permit or business permission │
Is féidir le náisiúnach AE oibriú in Éirinn gan ghá le cead │
│ │to work in Ireland
│ │fostaíochta ná cead gnó
│National │The Garda National Immigration Bureau (GNIB) is responsible for all │
│Síochána um │sé an deimhniú clárúcháin inimirce nó an cárta BNGSI (féach thíos) do │
│ │A type of employment permit issued for occupations in the annual salary range from│
│ │Cineál cead fostaíochta a eisítear do ghairmeacha sa raon tuarastail bliantúil │
│General │€30,000 to €60,000 and for a very few employments with annual salaries below │
│ │idir €30,000 agus €60,000 agus do chúpla cineál fostaíochta le tuarastail │
Some occupations are ineligible for employment permits and the employer │
Tá roinnt gairmeacha neamh-incháilithe do cheadanna │
│Permit │must have shown that the relevant vacancy could not be filled from within the EEA │
│Fostaíochta │oibre agus ní mór don fhostóir léiriú nach bhféadfaí an folúntas ábhartha a │
It lasts for 2 years and is renewable
Maireann sé ar feadh 2 bliana agus│
If you hold a General │
│ │is féidir é a athnuachan
│ │Employment Permit you will have residence stamp number 1 on your passport
Má tá Cead Fostaíochta Ginearálta agat beidh stampa │ │ │cónaithe uimhir 1 ar do phas
│GNIB card │Another name for the immigration certificate of registration
│Cárta BNGSI │Ainm eile don deimhniú clárúcháin inimirce
│ │Immigration officers are appointed under statute by the Minister for Justice and │
│ │Ceapann an tAire Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais oifigigh inimirce faoi │
Their functions include interviewing those arriving in the State to │
Áirítear lena gcuid feidhmeanna agallamh a chur orthu siúd a thagann │
│Immigration │establish whether they are foreign nationals, and if so, whether they have the │
│Oifigeach │chuig an Stát le socrú an náisiúnaigh eachtrannacha iad, agus más iad, an │
│officer │correct documents and whether they should be given permission to land or be in the│
│inimirce │bhfuil na doiciméid chearta acu agus an ceart cead a thabhairt dóibh tuirlingt │
This permission generally takes the form of a stamp on the passport
Is gnách go dtugtar an cead sin i bhfoirm stampa ar an │
│ │usually known as a residence stamp or it may be a landing stamp only. │
Tugtar stampa cónaithe air sin de ghnáth nó d'fhéadfadh nach mbeadh ann │
│ │A member of the Garda Síochána who is responsible for the registration of non-EEA │
│ │Ball den Gharda Síochána atá freagrach as náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE a fhanann in │
│Immigration │nationals who stay in Ireland for more than 3 months
│ │Éirinn ar feadh níos faide ná 3 mhí a chlárú
│registration │In the Dublin metropolitan region this function resides with the Burgh Quay │
│Oifigeach │ │ │clárúcháin │I réigiún cathrach Bhaile Átha Cliath is é an Oifig Chlárúcháin Cé an Bhúrcaigh│
Outside this area, the local immigration registration officer│
│ │t-oifigeach clárúcháin inimirce áitiúil ná an Ceannfort ag ceanncheathrú dúiche│
│ │is the Superintendent at the local Garda district headquarters
│ │áitiúil an Gharda Síochána. │
│ │The type of Certificate of Registration issued to a non-EEA national family member│
│ │An cineál deimhniú clárúcháin a eisítear do bhall teaghlaigh saoránaigh AE a │
│Permanent │of an EU citizen who has lived in the State for 5 years
│ │bhfuil cónaí air/uirthi sa Stát le 5 bliana nach náisiúnach LEE é/í
│residence │fact that the family member’s permission to remain is residence stamp no
│Cárta │Tabharfaidh an cárta sin taifead gurb é an cead atá ag an mball teaghlaigh │
Even if the holder is a visa-required national, they will not need a re-entry │
│ │bheith aige/aici, é an sealbhóir ní bheidh gá acu le víosa athiontrála nuair a │
│ │visa when returning to Ireland after a stay abroad
│ │fhilleann siad ar Éirinn tar éis seala thar lear
Application form EU 3 is used │
│ │EU 3 le cur isteach ar an gcineál sin cárta BNGSI
│ │to apply for this type of GNIB card
Ní ghearrtar aon táille
│Permanent │A letter issued to an EU citizen who has lived in Ireland for 5 years or more
│ │Litir a eisítear doshaoránach AE a bhfuil cónaí air/uirthi in Éirinn le 5 │
│residence │Application form EU 2 is used apply for this certificate. There is no fee
│ │Úsáidtear an fhoirm iarratais EU 2 le cur isteach ar an deimhniú sin
│ │A non-EEA national dependant (or partner) of an EU citizen who is not a qualifying│
│ │Cleithiúnach, céile nó páirtnéir sibhialta náisiúnaigh AE nach náisiúnach LEE é│
│ │family member (see below)
│ │/í nach ball teaghlaigh cáilithe é/í (féach thíos)
They have completed an application form EU1A and have │
Líon siad foirm iarratais │
│Permitted │been approved as a permitted family member by the Irish Naturalisation and │
│ │EU 1A agus tugadh cead dóibh mar bhall teaghlaigh ceadaithe ag Seirbhís │
│family member│Immigration Service (INIS) under the European Communities (Free Movement of │
│Ball teaghlaigh│Eadóirseachta agus Inimirce na hÉireann faoi Rialachán na gComhphobal Eorpach │
│ │A permitted family member will receive residence stamp no. 4 EU-FAM and will not │
│ │Gheobhaidh ball teaghlaigh ceadaithe stampa cónaithe uimhir 4 EU-FAM agus ní gá│
│ │need an employment permit or business permission to work in Ireland
│ │dó/dí le cead fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in Éirinn
│ │A person who has been invited to Ireland by the government, usually in response to│
│ │Duine ar thug an Rialtas cuireadh dó/di go hÉirinn, mar fhreagra ar ghéarchéim │
│Programme │a humanitarian crisis and at the request of the United Nations High Commissioner │
│ │dhaonnúil de ghnáth agus ar iarratas Ard-Choimisinéir na Náisiún Aontaithe do │
In general, they have the same rights as Convention refugees
Go ginearálta, bíonn na cearta céanna acu agus a bhíonn ag │
4 on their passport and will not│
│ │Beidh stampa cónaithe uimhir 4 ar phas dídeanaí cláir agus ní gá dó/dí le cead │
│ │need an employment permit or business permission to work in Ireland
│ │fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in Éirinn
│ │The non-EEA national spouse, civil partner or dependent relative of an EU citizen │
│ │An chéile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó gaol cleithiúnach le saoránach AE nach │
│ │who has exercised the right to move to and live in Ireland under the European │
│ │náisiúnach LEE é/í a chleachtaigh an ceart bogadh go hÉirinn agus cónaí inti │
│ │Communities (Free Movement of Persons) Regulations 2015
│ │faoi Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Saorghluaiseacht Daoine) 2015
│Qualifying │A person who has been approved by INIS as a qualifying family member and has │
│cáilithe │Gheobhaidh duine a cheadaigh Seirbhís Eadóirseachta agus Inimirce na hÉireann │

│ │mar bhall teaghlaigh cáilithe agus a líon foirm iarratais EU 1 stampa cónaithe │
4 EU-FAM and │ │ │will not need an employment permit or business permission to work in Ireland
│ │uimhir 4 EU-FAM agus ní gá dó/dí le cead fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in │
│ │Certificate of Registration will be 4 EU-FAM (which is the residence card of a │
Is é an deimhniú clárúcháin a bheidh ann ná 4 EU-FAM (arb é cárta │
│ │family member of a EU citizen. │
│ │cónaithe baill teaghlaigh saoránaigh AE) │
│ │A type of Certificate of Registration that is issued to a non-EEA citizen who is a│
│ │An cineál deimhniú clárúcháin a eisítear do shaoránach neamh-LEE ar ball │
│Residence │qualifying family member or permitted family member of an EU citizen under the │
│ │teaghlaigh cáilithe nó ball teaghlaigh ceadaithe de chuid saoránaigh AE é/í │
│card │European Communities (Free Movement of Persons) Regulations 2015
│Cárta cónaithe │faoi Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Saorghluaiseacht Daoine) 2015
│ │Form EU 1 or EU 1A is used to apply for this card
│ │ │ │ │Úsáidtear Foirm EU 1 nó EU 1A le cur isteach ar an gcárta seo
│ │The type of Certificate of Registration issued to non-EEA national dependants of │
│ │An cineál deimhniú clárúcháin a eisítear do chleithiúnaigh ar náisiúnaigh │
│ │citizens of Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein and Switzerland under the European │
│ │neamh-LEE iad le saoránaigh as an Íoslainn, an Iorua, Lichtinstéin agus an │
│ │Communities (Aliens) Regulations 1977 and the European Communities (Right of │
│ │Eilvéis faoi Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Eachtrannaigh) 1977 agus │
│ │Residence for Non-Economically Active Persons) Regulations 1997
│ │Gníomhach ó thaobh an Gheilleagair de) 1997
│Residence │Formerly issued to non-EEA dependants of citizens of all the EEA and Switzerland, │
│Doiciméad │ │ │cónaithe │Eisíodh é roimhe seo do chleithiúnaigh neamh-LEE le saoránaigh an LEE go léir │
│document │it is no longer issued to non-EEA dependants of EU citizens, who qualify for │
│ │agus na hEilvéise. Ní eisítear é a thuilleadh do chleithiúnaigh neamh-LEE le │
│ │will not need an employment permit or business permission to work in Ireland
│ │gá dó/dí le cead fostaíochta ná cead gnó le hoibriú in Éirinn
│ │form is now used to apply for this as well
│ │EU 1 le cur isteach air sin freisin
There is no fee
Ní ghearrtar aon táille
│Residence │An endorsement placed on the passport of a non-EEA national permitting them to │
│ │Cuirtear formhuiniú ar phas náisiúnach neamh-LEE a thugann cead dóibh fanacht │
It specifies the duration for which the person is permitted to │
Sonraíonn sé a fhaide agus a bhfuil cead ag an duine fanacht agus na│
│permission to│remain and the conditions under which they may remain (for example, whether they │
│Stampa cónaithe│coinníollacha ar féidir leo fanacht fúthu (mar shampla, an bhfuil cead acu a │
│remain │are allowed to work or not)
│nó cead fanacht│bheith ag obair nó nach bhfuil)
This stamp must be kept up to date at all times
Ní mór an stampa a choimeád suas le dáta i │
│ │The different types of stamp are explained below
│ │ │ │ │Tá míniú ar na cineálacha éagsúla stampa thíos
│ │Issued to a non-EEA national, for example, who is permitted to remain in Ireland │
│ │Eisítear é do náisiúnach neamh-LEE a bhfuil cead fanacht in Éirinn acu chun │
│Stamp number │for a specific, temporary and limited purpose on condition that they do not │
│Stampa uimhir 0│chríoch sonrach, sealadach agus teoranta, ar an gcoinníoll nach bhfaigheann │
│0 │receive State benefits and have private medical insurance. Examples include a │
│ │said sochair Stáit agus go bhfuil árachas sláinte príobháideach acu, mar │
│ │retired person of independent means or a visiting academic
│ │shampla, duine scortha le acmhainní neamhspleácha nó acadóir ar cuairt
│Stamp number │Issued to a non-EEA national who has received an employment permit, a business │
│ │Eisítear é do náisiúnach neamh-LEE a fuair cead fostaíochta, cead gnó nó údarú │
│1 │permission or a working holiday authorisation
│Stampa uimhir 1│saoire oibre
Since 1 March 2014 there are new │
Ó 2014 tá socruithe speisialta le haghaidh dochtúirí neamh-LEE ag│
│Stamp number │Issued to a non-EEA national trainee accountant (pdf)
│Stampa uimhir │Eisítear é do cuntasóir faoi oiliúint neamh-LEE (pdf)
│Stamp number │Issued to students who are permitted to remain under the Third Level Graduate │
│Stampa uimhir │Eisítear é do mhac léinn a bhfuil cead fanacht aige/aici faoin Scéim Chéimithe │
│Stamp number │Issued to a non-EEA national student who is permitted to work for up to 20 hours a│
│ │oibriú suas go 20 uair in aghaidh na seachtaine i rith an téarma agus suas go │
│2 │week during term and up to 40 hours a week during holidays
│Stampa uimhir 2│40 uair in aghaidh na seachtaine le linn na laethanta saoire
(The student must be │
(Ní mór go mbeadh│
│ │attending a full-time recognised course of at least a year)
│ │an mac léinn ag freastal ar chúrsa lán-aimseartha a mhaireann bliain ar a │
│Stamp number │Issued to a non-EEA national student who is not permitted to work
│Stampa uimhir │Eisítear é do mhac léinn ar náisiúnach neamh-LEE é/í nach bhfuil cead aige/aici│ │2A │oibriú
│Stamp number │Issued to a non-EEA national who is not permitted to work, such as a visitor, a │
│ │Eisítear é do náisiúnach neamh-LEE nach bhfuil cead aige/aici oibriú, mar │
│3 │minister of religion or the spouse, civil partner or dependant of an employment │
│Stampa uimhir 3│shampla, cuairteoir; ministir reiligiúin; céile agus cleithiúnaí shealbhóirí │
│ │Issued to the following categories of people, all of whom do not need an │
│ │Eisítear é do na catagóirí seo a leanas de dhaoine agus is féidir leo go léir │
│ │employment permit to work in Ireland. │
│ │oibriú gan ghá le cead fostaíochta: │
│ │ • *Spouses and civil partners of Irish nationals │
│ │ • *Céilí nó páirtnéirí sibhialta náisiúnaigh Éireannacha │
│ │ • *Family members of EEA nationals │
│ │ • *Cleithiúnaithe le náisiúnaigh LEE │
│ │ • *People who have permission to remain on the basis of parentage of an Irish │
│ │ • *Daoine a bhfuil cead acu fanacht toisc gur tuismitheoir linbh Éireannaigh │
│Stamp number │ child │
│Stampa uimhir 4│ iad │
│4 │ • *People granted international protection (refugeeor subsidiary protection │
│ │ • Daoine ar deonaíodh cosaint idirnáisiúnta (stádas dídeanaí nó cosanta │
│ │ • *Former asylum-seekers granted leave to remain │
│ │ • *Iar-iarrthóirí tearmainn ar tugadh cead dóibh fanacht │
│ │ • Non-EEA nationals on intra-company transfer │
│ │ • Náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE ar aistriú idirchomhlachta │
│ │ • Non-EEA nationals who have working visas or work authorisations │
│ │ • Náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE a bhfuil víosaí oibre nó údaraithe oibre acu │
│ │In addition, people in the category marked * do not need a business permission
│ │*Is féidir le daoine sa chatagóir seo marcáilte * oibriú gan ghá le cead gnó
│ │Issued to non-EEA national family members of EU citizens who have exercised their │

│ │chleachtaigh a gceart bogadh go hÉirinn agus cónaí ann faoi Rialacháin na │
│Stamp number │of Persons) Regulations 2015
│Stampa uimhir 4│gComhphobal Eorpach (Saorghluaiseacht Daoine) 2015
│4 (EU FAM) │People holding this stamp are permitted to work without needing an employment │
│(EU FAM) │ │ │ │Is féidir le daoine a bhfuil an stampa seo acu oibriú gan ghá le cead │
│ │permit or business permission, and they can apply for a residence card under the │
│ │fostaíochta nó cead gnó, agus féadann siad cur isteach ar chárta cónaithe faoi │

It│ │certificate │is not an identity document
│sealadaigh │aige ann. Ní doiciméad aitheantais é
│ │An Irish visa is a certificate stating that the foreign national identified in it │
│ │Is é atá i víosa Éireannach na deimhniú a shonraíonn go dtugann an Rialtas cead│
│ │is permitted by the Government to be present at the frontier of the State for the │
│ │don náisiúnach eachtrannach atá aitheanta ann bheith i láthair ag teorainn an │
│ │purpose of seeking permission to enter the State

A visa is valid only if affixed │
Ní bhíonn víosa bailí ach má tá│
│ │to a passport or travel document
│ │sé ceangailte le pas nó le doiciméad taistil
│Visa │The granting of a visa only a form of pre-clearance
│ │ │ │Víosa │Níl i gceist le víosa a bhronnadh ach réamh-imréiteach
A visa merely permits a │
Ní thugann an víosa ach│
│ │person to travel to the state during the validity period of the visa
│ │cead do dhuine taisteal chuig an Stát le linn na tréimhse ina bhfuil an víosa │
│ │does not grant permission to enter or reside in the State
Ní thugann an víosa cead an Stát a iontráil ná cónaí ann
│ │given by the immigration officer at the point of entry, who has the authority to │
│ │sin ag an oifigeach inimirce ag an bpointe iontrála, a bhfuil an t-údarás aige │
│ │grant or deny such admission
│ │iontráil a bhronnadh nó a dhiúltú
